title: Direction of force on test charge from field map

content.description:
Refer to the material below to answer the following questions:

The figure above shows the electric field in a region surrounding four charged particles, labeled 1, 2, 3, and 4, that are held in place. (Vectors with very large magnitude are not shown.)
content.question: A small positive test charge is held at point P. Which of the following is closest to the direction of the force exerted on the test charge?

choices.label: Each option consists of a directional arrow. Option A. The arrow points to the left at a small angle above the horizontal.
Option B. The arrow points to the left at an angle greater than 45 degrees above the horizontal.
Option C. The arrow points to the right at an angle of about 45 degrees above the horizontal.
Option D. The arrow points to the right at a small angle below the horizontal.

content.answer: Option B. The arrow points to the left at an angle greater than 45 degrees above the horizontal.
